mapper.update:
update video
video_id = #{record.videoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_id = #{record.cId,jdbcType=TINYINT},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image = #{record.image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
playurl = #{record.playurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
show_time = #{record.showTime,jdbcType=DATE},
country = #{record.country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
playtimes = #{record.playtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
score = #{record.score,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
state = #{record.state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
introduce = #{record.introduce,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update video set video_id = #{record.videoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_id = #{record.cId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{record.image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, playurl = #{record.playurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, show_time = #{record.showTime,jdbcType=DATE}, country = #{record.country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, playtimes = #{record.playtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{record.score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, state = #{record.state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, introduce = #{record.introduce,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

update video set video_id = #{record.videoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_id = #{record.cId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{record.image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, playurl = #{record.playurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, show_time = #{record.showTime,jdbcType=DATE}, country = #{record.country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, playtimes = #{record.playtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{record.score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, state = #{record.state,jdbcType=TINYINT}

update video
c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=TINYINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
playurl = #{playurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
show_time = #{showTime,jdbcType=DATE},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
playtimes = #{playtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
score = #{score,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where video_id = #{videoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update video set c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, playurl = #{playurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, show_time = #{showTime,jdbcType=DATE}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, playtimes = #{playtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where video_id = #{videoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
